akas: Connie en Clyde Belgium (Flemish title) (alternative spelling)
akas from release info: Connie en Clyde Belgium (Flemish title) (alternative spelling)

1.title: De kaars
1.plot: Pol senses that client Steven Dubois is a 'pinocchio', who keeps secrets from the dating agency. Searching his home, clumsy Pascal and irreverent Vincent accidentally kill his pet rodents and find evidence of a wife, but miss the point. Conny's husband, destitute martial arts teacher Hans Devos, is caught having kinky candle sex in the marital bed with the foxy yoga instructor.

2.title: De vloek
2.plot: The latest dating client maintains she's subject to a curse which hits her sexual partners until they leave her, and it seems to come true. Hans can't make up his mind whether to stay lucratively married to hideous Connie or keep his sexual playmate. Connie cuffs Hans to the bed all day 'to think it over', but failing to find someone else to rescue him, he ends up calling his adulterous partner, who exacts payment in kind, and his wife is the one who comes to her business senses.

3.title: In hemelsnaam
3.plot: The latest client is hard to please: Freddy will only settle for a fellow virgin. Vincent and Pascal are sent to check out the prospective partners. An alternative plan emerges: 'fixing' Freddie's own virginity.

4.title: De jubilee
4.plot: Hans is tormented by the ghost of an Asian adversary he accidentally killed in a martial arts duel, whom he now sees whenever he has sex with his suspicious, yet unsuspecting wife. Senior Luc reluctantly joins in his adventurous wife Lydia's plan to celebrate their anniversary by ordering 'casual' date partners, and keeps the evening with his platonic. She's over the moon in bed with with a student, until she happens to notice his other occupation. After Pol's neighbor cancels as sitter, he's forced to hide his cat in the office and is found out, also having passed ...

5.title: Don Jos
5.plot: New client Jos is a mystery: who would such as slick stud, whose gorgeous body instantly arouses hot fantasies, need a dating agency, claiming girls keep dumping him? Pol tries to deal with his humiliatingly exposed single status by finding out. Hans's report with kid course charge Bart's foxy mother arouses abuse and jealous vandalism in Conny. Vincent picks naive admirer Peggy as toy in a kinky wager with his fellow sleazy womanizer mates, who can seduce must of their 'stake girls'. Her admirer Pascal resolves to help and ultimately rescue her.

6.title: Gyn & Tonic
6.plot: Michael, a gentleman MD, wants a partner after his wife left the workaholic. Even the agency's klutzes quickly find such a great catch a foxy partner, Katrien. their first date is a success, accept that she's scared by his 'cold' terminology for her anatomy. Conny enjoys 'coaching' him in dirty talk too much. Hans, still 'banished' in the garage, eagerly welcomes father in law Hugo Coninx, who needs a place to stay after ten years abroad and presents his recent bride, Pong, while shamelessly practicing nudism indoors. Connie won't stand for either and spends the night...

7.title: Liefde is blind
7.plot: Grossly rude blind client Griet insists on a good-looking date after a lifetime of being mismatched with 'sweet' men. After seeing his father in law Hugo and child wife Pong evicted and learning Connie committed adultery with a client, Hans insists on marriage counseling, but therapist Patricia proves an even worse lunatic then he always suspected. Pol considers a magazine test may 'prove' him being gay. Griet's first date with gentle gentleman Jacob fails after she judges him average and cross-eyed. To make her more appreciative, she's matched to turbo womanizer Jos,...

8.title: Lieven op het eerste gezicht
8.plot: The team hides lacking experience in finding a partner for their first gay client, Lieven, who specifies he wants a 'bear'. Pascal actually fits the bill himself and secretly enjoys Lieven's attention while they share interests, but freaks out, afraid to admit being gay. Broke, Hugo arranges for his Asian 'bride' Pong to give massages in the agency, but what about 'happy endings'?

9.title: Valentijn
9.plot: On Valentine's day, the agency holds its annual dinner party, but none of the staff is enthusiastic. Vicnent is absent, supposedly directing a German porn movie, in fact just as naked extra. Paol still refuses to acknowledge being gay, so he flirts with a silly woman rather then consorting with Lieven, who forces a shy straight client-guest to help 'retort'. After the therapist helps Hans drive home that control-freak Connie is no less guilty of wrecking their marriage, she ends up sneaking back home for spontaneous fun in bed. Peggy's attempt to alleviate Pol's ...

10.title: De spier
10.plot: Vincent is eager not to risk the inheritance of his aunt Germaine, widow since 15 years, who finally wants to feel desired again. The dating agency performs even worse since Hans and Connie's therapist got them to use truth piggy-bank, which also gets Hans evicted for telling the truth about his Japanese debts. Vincent may be proud of his porn part, is causes embarrassment and worse, especially as it gets erroneously included in the agency's gift packages. One of those goes to Germaine, but Vincent desperate move literally accidentally gets her a senior date, yet no ...

11.title: Geflikt
11.plot: Pol is finally visibly happier due to Lieven's attention, yet dares not admit it as even Connie believes he has a girl friend. Client Els picks Pascal at first sight as only suitable date. Eager to finally get hooked up, he turns down Peggy, who turns jealous and admits the porn proved Vincent unfit. Alas, Els keeps surprising Pascal unpleasantly. Hans is banned from the Coninx home, not even allow in for a leak, and Hugo fakes having turned on the adulterer fearing to be evicted next with pregnant Pong. His drug contraband trick will see to that anyhow, while turning...

12.title: Maatje voor het leven
12.plot: Pol convinces Connie to take the challenging case of midget Danny, but violently overreacting to his 'ingratitude' exposes her to legal action. Jealous Peggy's clumsy attempts to win back Pascal accidentally infuriate his cop lover Els enough to see him dumped. Hans gets out of the doghouse by driving Pong to maternity.

13.title: 12 lieven 13 ongelukken
13.plot: Bald teenager Sammy (14) becomes the agency's first minor client by pleading he risks dying from cancer without ever having loved or even kissed a girl. Hans arranges for a girl cousin as no genuine date is found, but pushes Connie to turn her book presentation into a benefit, with sponsored kissing, for the cancer kid's surgery. Only when that's arranged he finds out Sammy isn't sick at all, just fatherless and a peers-embarrassed virgin. The event also becomes the occasion for Pol to come out with Liven and for Pascal to go steady with Peggy.

imdb.title: Connie & Clyde
